scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.backend: uv sync --directory backend && uv run --directory backend uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8002
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
